esqlQuery.esql:
// Alert triggers when the BLOCK to ALLOW ratio is higher than the set value (default 0.5 - 50%)
// You can adjust the threshold value by modifying the ratio in the WHERE clause.
FROM logs-aws.waf.otel-default
| WHERE @timestamp > NOW() - 5m
| STATS block_count = COUNT(aws.waf.action == "BLOCK" OR NULL), allow_count = COUNT(aws.waf.action == "ALLOW" OR NULL)
| EVAL ratio = block_count / TO_DOUBLE(allow_count)
| KEEP block_count, allow_count, ratio
| WHERE ratio >= 0.5
